name: Everyday Me
description:
An illustration of what is "In My Mind".

Drag and Drop the incoming horrors into the trash bin, and please save me.

Key Features:

-Drag & Drop mechanic

-Difficulty Progression over time

-Casual Gameplay

The Bitbucket:

https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/geumseonghan_gaw_7/src/master/

release note:

-version 1.0 full release

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
